reviewText: We love Jim.  Glad to find this season...can be hard to find on DVD.
I've been watching  all of the According to Jim series [I'm now on season four] and I laugh out loud!

I watched According to Jim for years when it was on ABC. Just starting watching the first season and it's classic Jim Belushi as he's always been. Just watch out for Larry Joe Campbell who plays Andy. He's always the nerding one in the series.
